name: DeLight Rest
description:
DeLight Rest provides you with a platform for creation. Removable glass base give you a living space to do what ever you like, such as planting and fish-farming. With such flexibility, DeLight Rest can easily fit with your living context based on your own art direction. 

Equipped with wooden smartphone stand which give you a space to place your smartphone in a relax way. With natural sound reflection system, the glass base can easily transform to an amplifier when you play your music through smartphone's speaker on the stand.

DeLight Rest, is a living lamp to you, unlike others.

Designed by Max Cheung

Size: 528 x 547 x 80mm

Material:
Light source - 14x 0.5W LED light bulb (i.e. 700 Lux)
Body	– Acrylic
Base - Glass

Package includes: Lamp body, glass base, wooden smartphone stand, AC adapter (240W)

Remarks: 
Free shipping is included for Hong Kong region. 

Shipping to other region is not covered and is subject to additional cost. Please contact us at design32@netvigator.com with the product name and number of the pieces you would like to order together with the shipping address. We will advise you the costs and any required details within 5 working days.

name: DeLight Light Tower
description:
DeLight Light Tower is a handmade art piece which include a designed smartphone stand for any smartphone. It is an extension for your smartphone which give you a grand space for placing your phone. Powerful back light projects the relax light to your wall and gives you a flexibility in having your desired lighting at your home. 

Designed by Max Cheung

Size: 138 x 500 x 77mm 

Material: 
Light source - 14x 0.5W LED light bulb (i.e. 700 Lux) 
Body	– Wood

Package includes: Lamp body, AC adapter (240W)

Remarks: 
Free shipping is included for Hong Kong region. 

Shipping to other region is not covered and is subject to additional cost. name: Hours of DeLight - Ours
description:
Ours is a recorder of your memory and it's the evidence of your life. As an art piece for time, it is made of stainless steel and is created with handmade curved shape.

Ours means the timeless of love to you.

Size: 430 x 430 x 30mm

Material: Stainless steel
Electric supply: 2A battery
